dict.acceptation: 最初的；开始的；首字母的；
首字母；[语音学]声母；特大的大写字母；

sent.orig: There are two styles of setting: raised initial or dropped initial( inset initial).
sent.trans: 有两种排法：上升起首字母或下降起首字母。

sent.orig: Change the initial guess calculation method. Refer Object Properties for a discussion of EP Initial Guess.
sent.trans: 初步估计计算方法的改变。物业反对将讨论美国初步猜测。

sent.orig: In this case, we let the initial discontinuity divide the initial plane into two infinite parts.
sent.trans: 在这部分我们取初始间断将初始平而分成两个无限区域。

sent.orig: Especially very small businesses with no initial capital benefit from initial savings.
sent.trans: 缺乏启动资本的小型独资企业尤其可以从中节俭初期资金。

sent.orig: See later under 'initial values' for how to any control an initial value.
sent.trans: 参见后文“初值”了解如何给控件设初值。
